product_name: Ultimate Survival Technologies Para 550 Paracord Bracelet - 2012 Closeout
long_description: It's a bracelet. It's a survival tool. Yep, it's both. Wear the Ultimate Survival Technologies Para 550(TM) Paracord bracelet on your wrist and be prepared for unexpected emergencies. This bracelet unravels so you can use the 7 ft. of 4mm, 550 lb.-test cord for lashing gear, making snares, replacing shoelaces, tending injuries and so much more. You can even pull out threads from the core to use as fishing line and sewing thread. Quick-release plastic buckle has a low profile for comfort against your wrist. Closeout.
short_description: It's a bracelet. It's a survival tool. Yep, it's both. Wear the Ultimate Survival Technologies Para 550(TM) Paracord bracelet on your wrist and be prepared for unexpected emergencies.
